Text: Just a quick note. this is English only. And the graphics is Software rendered 640x480 as it's not possible to get hardware acceleration to work with this game with out running win98 natively on the system (VMWare included).

Unfortunately some users on older (not very) XP systems seams to have issues running this, the system will go in to 256 color mode and the game won't launches. The solution for this is to change the settings for the virtual machine, add a CD-ROM drive, unhidden the menu (under display), boot the system, hit the right ALT+enter to exit full screen mode. When it goes to low color mode, hit ctrl+c multiple times until you get a nasty sound from your speakers (this is normal).
Go to start-> settings -> add/remove and remove virtual machine addons. From the Action menu select install Virtual machine addons.

I'm very sorry for this inconvenience and will put up a new torrent once this is fixed for all systems :(
cannot be real. A current retail title does not weigh in at 244mb. The demo is larger than that.
Current retail title? This game was released in 1998...

It's not fake, Windows 98 takes up around 350MB and dark omen full install (no videos) takes up 250MB, and 7z is an awesome compression algorithm. Also the Dark Omen Demo is 65MB jack ass. Even if there was virus in this (and there is not) it would be contained in the virtual machine.

I found the issue in XP is that it can't start in full screen so if you just disable that from the beginning it should run fine.
